byline.original: By RICK ROJAS and VIVIAN YEE

lead_paragraph: Diane Haslett-Rudiano, the board’s chief clerk in Brooklyn, has been suspended amid an internal inquiry into the handling of the voting rolls as city and state officials begin their own investigations.

headline.main: Elections Board Official in Brooklyn Removed Amid Investigation
headline.print_headline: Election Official  Is Suspended  Amid an Inquiry

snippet: Diane Haslett-Rudiano, the board’s chief clerk in Brooklyn, has been suspended amid an internal inquiry into the handling of the voting rolls as city and state officials begin their own investigations.
